name: No Hoomans Allowed
description:
Collide with a Human to Punch them! Collide three separate times to deal three separate punches in order to destroy a human- for good! Complete the game by exterminating 20 humans within the time limit.

W, A, S, D to move.

In collaboration with: 

Karen (Art, Level Design, and Programming Support) - https://itch.io/profile/afffds

Jada (Sound and Programming Support) - https://itch.io/profile/jcity28
